Disqus Auto Expander

Configuration options

Items to auto-expand

More replies “See more replies” links.

New replies “See # new replies” links that appear when others reply to a post that is already visible.

Long items "See more" links that cut off long posts and media items.

Mobile browsers only

Embedded media items Uploaded images, Tweets, YouTube videos, etc.

Hide links after opening …embedded media items. Note: If you choose this option you won’t be able to hide embedded media items.

Additional options

every seconds

Use dark theme …for this configuration page.

Log debug output …to the JavaScript console.

Extension details

Version 0.0.0

More information Github repository
